title: Longitudinal improvements in clinical and functional outcomes following initiation of elexacaftor/tezacaftor/ivacaftor in patients with cystic fibrosis
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Kadambari Vijaykumar, Hui Min Leung, Amilcar Barrios, Justin Wade, Heather Y. Hathorne, David P. Nichols, Guillermo J. Tearney, Steven M. Rowe, George M. Solomon
